code: var commentPostedTime=function commentPostedTime(timeInMileSec){var sec=(timeInMileSec/1000).toFixed(0);var min=(timeInMileSec/(1000*60)).toFixed(0);var hrs=(timeInMileSec/(1000*60*60)).toFixed(0);var days=(timeInMileSec/(1000*60*60*24)).toFixed(0);var weeks=(timeInMileSec/(1000*60*60*24*7)).toFixed(0);var months=(timeInMileSec/(1000*60*60*24*31)).toFixed(0);var years=(timeInMileSec/(1000*60*60*24*12)).toFixed(0);if(sec<60){return"seconds";}else if(min<60){return min+" mins";}else if(hrs<24){return hrs+" hrs";}else if(days<7){return days+" days";}else if(weeks<4){return weeks+" weeks";}else if(months<12){return months+" months";}else{return years+" year";}};export{commentPostedTime};
